source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_SEQ_00<tab>Moxia looks at you pleadingly, a tear welling in her eye.
target: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_SEQ_00<tab>Moxia a besoin de vos muscles, ou vos méninges, c'est selon.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_SEQ_01<tab>A great boar by the name of Kafre, once a beloved pet of the sylphs, has gone mad and now runs wild in the Sylphlands, goring all in sight with its fearsome tusks. Distraught at what has become of her erstwhile friend, Moxia makes the difficult but necessary decision of asking you to put the beast down. Participate in the FATE “What a Boar” in the western reaches of the Sylphlands and return to Moxia with proof that the deed is done.
target: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_SEQ_01<tab>Un terrible sanglier du nom de Kafre terrorise la région à l'ouest des Terres sylphes. Moxia aimerait que vous coupiez ses défenses pour l'empêcher de blesser quelqu'un. Participez à l'ALÉA “Défi<var 1D /var>: ben mon cochon<var 1D /var>!”, obtenez <var 33 ((Item)) 02 ((　7003)) 0202 /var> et ramenez-<var 08 ((<var 28 ((Item)) ((　7003)) 07 /var>)) ((la)) ((le)) /var> à Moxia au Refuge.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_SEQ_02<tab>Moxia is greatly heartened to see the tusk and learn that Kafre was not slain, but merely driven away. Moved at your kindness and courage, she offers her profuse gratitude, while hoping against hope that the great boar might return to Little Solace one day a gentler beast.
target: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez vaincu Kafre et ramené fièrement <var 33 ((Item)) 02 ((　7003)) 0202 /var> à Moxia, qui a été très im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né. Il sait désormais que les Sylphes du Refuge peuvent compter sur votre force.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_TODO_00<tab>Participate in the FATE “What a Boar” and deliver proof of your deed to Moxia.
target: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_TODO_00<tab>Participer à l'ALÉA “Défi<var 1D /var>: ben mon cochon<var 1D /var>!” à l'ouest des Terres sylphes, obtenir <var 33 ((Item)) 02 ((　7003)) 0202 /var> et <var 08 ((<var 28 ((Item)) ((　7003)) 07 /var>)) ((la)) ((le)) /var> ramener à Moxia au Refuge

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_000<tab><sniffle> ...Oh, trusted one. Please forgive this one. This one has a difficult favor to ask of trusted one.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je suis heureux de ta venue<var 1D /var>!
Car dans les Terres sylphes, <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F2093F0202 /var> a été vu<var 08 ((<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2093F07 /var>)) ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_001<tab>For many years, these ones kept a great tusked one named Kafre as a pet. Kafre is strongest of tusked ones, gives these ones great joy at tusk-fighting festivals.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_001<tab>C'est un sanglier, une terrible bête,
que l'on fait combattre durant certaines fêtes.
Il est si féroce qu'il n'a jamais connu la défaite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_002<tab>Alas! Kafre has escaped these ones' care, and now charges madly across Sylphlands, turning fearsome tusks on all in one's path. Is this touched ones' doing, or did Kafre tire of these ones' company? This one cannot say.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_002<tab>Mais malheureusement, il est très violent,
si on ne fait rien, il tuera des innocents.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_003<tab>This one does not want to harm tusked one, but Kafre...<sniffle>...must be stopped. Will trusted one perform sad deed?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_003<tab>Si d'aventure, tu l'aperçois,
pourrais-tu lui couper ses défenses<var 1D /var>?
Sans elles, il se calmera,
ça nous rendrait un service immense.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_020<tab>Ah, trusted one. Tell this one, is Kafre...<sob>...no more?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_020<tab><var 2B ((<var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F2093F0202 /var>)) /var> est <var 08 ((<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2093F07 /var>)) ((dangereuse)) ((dangereux)) /var>, sois vigilant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>,
même si je sais que tu es puissant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_021<tab>Trusted one broke off a tusk and Kafre ran away squealing? These ones' tusked friend still lives? Oh, this one could not have hoped for happier tidings!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_021<tab>Oh, mais c'est ce que je t'ai demandé<var 1D /var>!
J'étais certain que tu pouvais gagner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_022<tab>Is it too much to hope that Kafre will return to these ones someday as a gentle one? This one can but dream.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL308_01284_MOXIA_000_022<tab>À l'entrée du Refuge, je vais l'accrocher,
avec un peu de chance, nos ennemis seront effrayés.
